Text:
Classification: Game Show
Genre: Cooking/Food
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Tuesdays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: August 17, 2010
Episode Order: 16

The Great British Bake Off sees 10 amateur bakers competing in a series of challenges designed to test their cake-making abilities as they battle it out to be crowned the series champions. The series is presented by Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins as they also take a look at the history of baking in the country. Each week some of the hopefuls being eliminated from the competition. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/The_Great_British_Bake_Off)
